actions.name: Parse
actions.description: Begin creating a new event with the given sentence.

parameters.name: sentence
parameters.description: Begin creating a new event with the given sentence.

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: The notes parameter can be added to specify a note with the event.

parameters.name: add
parameters.description: Set to 1 to automatically add an event - be careful!

parameters.name: reminder
parameters.description: Set to 1 to make this a reminder instead of an event.

parameters.name: due
parameters.description: When is the reminder due. Requires the format ”yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm”

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start time of the event. Requires the format ”yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm”

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end time of the event. Requires the format ”yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm”

parameters.name: allDay
parameters.description: Set to 1 to make this an all day event

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to jump to. Supports the following formats

options.description: Natural language such as ”Tuesday” or ”next month”. Fantastical will do its best to show the date.
